attributes.action: Give paramedics and nurses a pay rise for their work in the Covid-19 pandemic
attributes.additional_details: Covid-19 has been extremely tough and the paramedics and nurses who have worked in the front line throughout the whole 11 months of it deserve much more, they deserve a pay rise! They have risked their lives to save other people and have had to take on 3x the workload, paramedics and nurses are burnt out and are suffering serious mental health issues and PTSD. They have lost loved ones, friends and colleagues. This is not a hoax! They deserve better. They have done so much for everybody!
attributes.background: Give paramedics and nurses a pay rise of £2000, they deserve it for the work they have done throughout the pandemic !

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Recognise all members of NHS nursing profession by giving them a 12.5% pay rise: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560253

Payrise for Paramedics/Technicians: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/569789
